partnerDetails.about: Control Software Solutions (Pty) Ltd (CSS) is a proud Level 2 B-BBEE contributor who provides total engineering solutions to our customers in the Engineering & Infrastructural Environment focused on electrical, control and automation. Through more than 15 years working with customers in the process industry, system developers and equipment manufacturers, our team of engineers has continuously provided solutions inspired on the leadership of our customers as well as in the aggressive markets where they compete. We offer a win – win partnership where the customer is always in control. We offer our clients, cutting edge professional engineering solutions from the conceptual and design stages to the implementation and commissioning of various industrial projects.
